Name: The Angry Banana
About the game: The Angry Banana is a short 2D action game with a funny story that's full of NONSENSE! You go out on a journey to avenge your 'family'. But, will you be able to? You'll be going through five different levels where you need to pay a LOT of attention to what's going on around you. In order to survive, know when you should move, and when you shouldn't. Use your deadly banana peels and your devastating banana kick to destroy different enemies who will try to stop you. If you survive, then maybe.....just MAYBE, you'll be able to get your revenge.
